item.title: Cas
item.description: install docker run --rm -p 8080:8080 apereo/cas-initializr:6.3.0 curl http://localhost:8080/starter.tgz -o cas.tgz tar -zxvf cas.tgz chmod +x docker-build.sh chmod +x docker-run.sh ./docker-build.sh
